Dear Collegues,

The present comment deals with the install of cantera-1.5 (or -1.5.2)
on a Gentoo Linux workstation (stable packages). The tar file was
copied in /usr/local and produced a cantera directory after "tar
zxvf". 
I commented lines associated with the preparation of Fortran, MathLab
and Python interfaces (the configure file).CANTERA_ROOT and PATH were
fixed to /usr/local/cantera and $CANTERA_ROOT/bin, respectively.
I used gcc/g++ 3.3.2 which includes g77. Line F77 in configure was
uncommented and its f77 was replaced by gcc. Morevover line containing
F90 was commented.

./ configure, make and make install worked.

The "make" in examples/cxx ended with:

g++ -o ./cxx_examples examples.o kinetics_examples1.o ...
/usr/local/cantera/build/lib/i686-pc-linux-gnu/lre
cipes.a(simplx.o)(text+0x4a
): in function <<simplx_>>: undefined reference to `s_pass`

The same was reproduced several times and related to:
libctlapack
libctmath
lictblas

As a consequence cxx_examples was not generated.

I would be very grateful for any help. Thank in advance.

Thierry Lepoint, Prof. at the Institut Meurice (Belgium)
